label: specifiedAssertion
comment: A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.

rangeIncludes.comment: A statement that user needs of the present are met without compromising the needs of future generations.

domainIncludes.comment: Any tangible output or service produced by human or mechanical effort or by a natural process for trade purposes.
A naturally occurring or designed sequence of operations or events in order to produce something.
An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.
A group of products considered or dealt with together.
A referenced norm or requirement that establishes uniform criteria, methods, processes and practices, such as in engineering or technical areas.
The process of certifying organizational performance or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.
The process of certifying that a process has met performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements.
The process of certifying that a certain product batch has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
The process of certifying that a certain product, process or organization has passed performance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in a standard or regulation.
The process of certifying that a certain product has passed performance and quality assurance tests, or qualification requirements stipulated in regulations.
The process of certifying that a certain animal has met performance and quality assurance requirements, or qualification requirements as stipulated in regulations.
